trans-unit.source: Customizing the interface of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to visualize contextual help, activate button labels or manage the items on the dashboard (<MadCap:xref href="#Options_on_the_General_Preferences_page" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Customizing the interface of the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> allows you to visualize contextual help, activate button labels or manage the items on the dashboard (<MadCap:xref href="#Options_on_the_General_Preferences_page" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: La personnalisation de l'interface de la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.ade_admin" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> vous permet d'afficher l'aide contextuelle, d'activer les libellés des boutons ou de gérer les éléments du tableau de bord (<MadCap:xref href="#Options_on_the_General_Preferences_page" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: You can modify the following parameters (<MadCap:xref href="#General_preferences_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

seg-source.mrk: You can modify the following parameters (<MadCap:xref href="#General_preferences_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>):

target.mrk: Les paramètres suivants peuvent être modifiés (<MadCap:xref href="#General_preferences_parameters" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>) :

trans-unit.source: Displays a presentation of the newest <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> features when you log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

seg-source.mrk: Displays a presentation of the newest <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> features when you log into the <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

target.mrk: Affiche une présentation des nouvelles fonctionnalités <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />lorsque vous vous connectez à la <MadCap:variable name="ALN.adm_exe" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />.

trans-unit.source: Displays unused predefined administration objects, such as strategies, rules, and file categories. You can delegate rights to operators who will not be able to modify administration objects.

seg-source.mrk: Displays unused predefined administration objects, such as strategies, rules, and file categories.
You can delegate rights to operators who will not be able to modify administration objects.

target.mrk: Affiche les objets d'administration prédéfinis inutilisés, tels que les stratégies, les règles et les catégories de fichiers.
Vous pouvez déléguer des droits à des opérateurs qui ne pourront pas modifier les objets d'administration.
